attributes.action: Call for an immediate public investigation and review into Andrew Mitchell's alleged behaviour towards Downing Street Police Officers
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition if you believe the Prime Minister  and HM Government should undertake a full public enquiry into the alleged outrageous behaviour of the Conservative Chief Whip Andrew Mitchell towards Downing Street Police Officers.

Also this petition calls for the resignation of Andrew Mitchell should the enquiry find him guilty of using abusive, insulting and unacceptable language and behaviour.
